item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2 Actor Graham Greene Sadly Passes Away
item.content:encoded:
Graham Greene lit up screens throughout a glittering 45-year career. The acclaimed actor did it all and has sadly passed away at the age of 73. Many gamers will fondly recognize and remember him for his incredible portrayal of Rains Fall in Rockstar Games‚Äô Red Dead Redemption 2.

My first memory of Graham Greene was his role as Detective Joe Lambert in Die Hard with a Vengeance. He plays a valiant cop who ultimately tries his best to save kids he believes are in mortal danger. This is one of countless roles Graham accrued over his 40-plus-year career before his untimely passing on September 1.

Despite a resume anyone would snatch up in a heartbeat, Graham only had one video game role‚ÄîRains Fall in Red Dead Redemption 2.

Red Dead Redemption 2 Voice Actor Graham Greene Passes Away Aged 73

If you‚Äôve played RDR2, you know how important Rains Fall is to the story. He does his best to rein in his son‚ÄîEagle Flies‚Äîand advocates peace wherever possible.

Graham absolutely nails the role perfectly. It‚Äôs a wonder that this was his lone video game opportunity when you think about it. Technically, it wasn‚Äôt the only gaming project the actor was attached to.

In 2023, Graham played Marlon in HBO‚Äôs epic adaptation of Naughty Dog‚Äôs The Last of Us for one episode. He was also in 2008‚Äôs Turok: Son of Stone‚Äîbut that reference is a bit more out there.

The actor graced TV shows, movies, and one of the greatest video games of all time, and it‚Äôs his role as Rains Fall that further cemented his legacy in the memories of millions of gamers.

Do you have a favorite Graham Greene role over the decades? Let me know, and also let us know if this is giving you the edge to go back and play Red Dead Redemption 2 for the tenth time.

item.title: When is Fortnite Globals 2025? FNCS Global Championship 2025 Schedule, Start Times, & How to Watch
item.content:encoded:
After months of competing in tournaments across the globe, the Fortnite FNCS Global Championship is right around the corner, and we‚Äôve got all the details you need.

While Fortnite players are currently locked into a season that is comparable to Helldivers 2, the best players from around the world are gearing up for the biggest Fortnite tournament of the year, set to battle it out for a share of the whopping $2m prize pool.

If you want to make sure you don‚Äôt miss any of the action, we‚Äôve got all the details you need for the Fortnite FNCS Global Championship 2025.

When is Fortnite Global 2025?

The Fortnite Championship Global (FNCS) takes place on Saturday, September 6 and Sunday, September 7 2025.

This year, the event takes place at the LDLC Arena in Lyon, France, with a whopping Prize Pool of over $2m up for grabs.

33 Trios will compete for their share of the prize pool and the title of Global Champion.

What is The FNCS Global Start Time?

Coverage of the FNCS Global Championship kicks off on both days at 6:45 am PT, although the first matches on both days don‚Äôt start until 9:10 am PT.

Each day will feature six matches of action, with the final match on both days taking place at 12:05 pm PT. Scoring is based on placement and eliminations, with the highest total score after 12 matches crowned the new World Champion.

In the table below, we‚Äôve outlined the times that coverage starts and the timings of the first matches on both days in major time zones across the world.

How to Watch Fortnite FNCS Global

The FNCS Global tournament is available to watch on Twitch, YouTube, and in-game using the dedicated Fortnite Island.

Those watching on Twitch can earn exclusive Twitch Drops for the event, with no extra incentives available for those watching on YouTube.

For those watching from inside Fortnite, Hype Points are earnable to unlock exclusive island merch, while you can also jump into the Rift Rumble to experience the FNCS experience directly. The Fortnite Island code is 2345-4055-3398.

item.title: Path of Exile 2‚Äôs Peak Player Count Skyrockets By Nearly 300% In August
item.content:encoded:
POE2 player numbers have been dwindling in recent weeks. This happens to many games after their initial launch and hype. But players have flooded back to Path of Exile 2 to make player count numbers blow up‚Äîthanks to the ‚ÄòThird Edict‚Äô update and free weekend incentive.

Arguably, Diablo 4‚Äòs biggest competitor is Path of Exile 2. The ARPG launched to great success in December 2024. Over half a million of you flooded the Path of Exile 2 servers to see what the fuss was all about. Peak numbers were still close to the 200K mark by January 2025, and things have tailed off a bit‚Äîsave for the April 2025 update.

However, a free weekend opportunity combined with a huge new content update has revitalized the ARPG sequel once more.

Path of Exile 2 Third Edict Update & Free Weekend Boosts Numbers

Path of Exile 2 was free-to-play for everyone from August 29 to September 1. Whether you own the game or don‚Äôt, everyone was entitled to download the game and try it out.

This was to get as many eyes and hours on the game‚Äôs Third Edict content update as possible.

According to the POE 2 website: ‚ÄúYou will get access to all the content currently available in Path of Exile 2, including the newly released Third Edict Content Update. There are no limits to character leveling, and all progress made during this period will be saved to your account. When the Free Weekend ends, you can continue playing by purchasing an Early Access key or by waiting until Path of Exile 2 becomes free to play at full release.‚Äù

For reference, Steam Charts says Path of Exile 2 achieved around 8,000 players on average in July 2025, with a peak of around 14,000. Whereas August 2025 saw an average of about 25,000 users, but a peak of over 352,000! The average would‚Äôve been low throughout the whole month, up until the free weekend right at the end of the month.

Did you get a chance to play Path of Exile 2 during the free weekend? Are you going to continue to play it? It seems to be a bold strategy that paid off for Grinding Gear Games. If you agree or disagree, let us know through the Insider Gaming forum.

item.title: Which Call of Duty is Free?‚ÄîPlay COD For Free, Explained
item.content:encoded:
Call of Duty has existed for more than two decades, and in that time, dozens of games have been released to flesh out the franchise. It‚Äôs arguably the most popular first-person shooter series of all time, and today, we‚Äôre helping people get a taste of it by answering an all-important question: ‚ÄòWhich Call of Duty is free?‚Äô

In this guide, I‚Äôll outline which Call of Duty games are free and which ones you need to pay for.

Are There Free Call of Duty Games?

Few franchises sell quite so many copies as Call of Duty does. It‚Äôs a titan of the gaming industry, and every year, even amidst bad press, the annual Call of Duty release tops the charts. In 2022, Modern Warfare II was released, and within ten days, it had topped $1 billion in sales.

However, as it‚Äôs a premium franchise, Call of Duty can be expensive, and typically, every new title will boast a top-tier pricing point as well as a paid battle pass and other in-game bundles and items that also cost real money. It can get very pricey, very quickly, and for some players, the need to find a free Call of Duty game arises.

With that in mind, which Call of Duty is free?

Good News: You Can Play Call of Duty For Free

There are two ways that you can play Call of Duty for free, and they‚Äôre both dramatically popular.

Firstly, there‚Äôs the Warzone ecosystem. This battle-royale-backed platform features one of the most popular titles to ever emerge into the genre, boasting hundreds of millions of players and an ever-changing landscape. It debuted in 2020, and in the years that it has been active, it has seen all-new maps, modes, events, and the growth of a massive community.

Fortunately, Warzone (in every capacity) is free to play across PlayStation, Xbox, and PC platforms ‚Äì it‚Äôs also a crossplay title, which has served to unite cross-platform players. There‚Äôs a possibility that Warzone will also be available on Nintendo devices.

If Warzone isn‚Äôt your kind of thing, then you can get started with the other free Call of Duty game ‚Äì COD Mobile. This is a handheld-exclusive game that has existed since 2019, and it‚Äôs a monumental title that, according to Statista, secures around four million new downloads every single month.

Call of Duty: Mobile incorporates content from several successful COD games, featuring a wide range of game modes, a battle royale mode, and plenty of customisation options. It‚Äôs free-to-play, but there are many microtransactions under the surface that fuel the development of the game itself.

That answers the titular question, ‚Äòwhich Call of Duty is free‚Äô. There‚Äôs a battle royale platform that also includes an extraction shooter sub-mode and a mobile platform that is ever-expanding. That‚Äôs not a bad selection, considering it‚Äôll cost you absolutely nothing to get involved with either of them!

item.title: Today‚Äôs Wordle Hints, Help, And Answer‚ÄîGame #1536 Solution

Every day, Wordle fans around the world log in to guess the five-letter word of the day. Whether you‚Äôre a seasoned player or just starting out, knowing today‚Äôs hints and strategies can help you solve Wordle faster and improve your daily streak. Of course, that‚Äôs if you don‚Äôt mind the extra assistance. In this article, we‚Äôll share helpful hints, tips on how to play, today‚Äôs Wordle answer (Game #1536), and yesterday‚Äôs solution for comparison.

To play today‚Äôs Wordle, head to the game‚Äôs website. If you just want to go right to today‚Äôs answer without any tips or tricks, you can click right here.

NOTE: The following information will include spoilers on today‚Äôs, and yesterday‚Äôs, edition of Wordle. If you don‚Äôt want the answer given to you, stop scrolling.

What Is Wordle?

Wordle is a daily online word puzzle created by Josh Wardle, who first created the game as a prototype in 2013 and released it in 2021. It challenges players to guess a five-letter word in six attempts or fewer, using clues from previous guesses. The game became a viral hit in late 2021 due to its simplicity, shareable results, and the excitement of solving a new puzzle every day. Wordle has even inspired countless spin-offs and daily challenges across social media.

How To Play Wordle

Wordle is a simple but addictive word puzzle. Each day, players get six attempts to guess the five-letter word answer. After each guess:

  • Green letters are correct and in the right position.
  • Yellow letters are correct but in the wrong position.
  • Gray letters are not in the word at all.

The goal is to guess the word in as few tries as possible. Daily puzzles keep players coming back for more, making it a fun brain exercise and a trending topic online.

When Do Wordle Games Reset

A new word is added to Wordle every day at 12am or Midnight EST.

Tips On How To Play

While everyone has a different strategy for how they play the game to get today‚Äôs Wordle answer, there are tips and tricks you can use to help you get the daily words in as few attempts as possible.

  • Tip 1: Use a word with common vowels and consonants (like SLATE or STRAW) to reveal useful letters early.
  • Tip 2: Don‚Äôt just rearrange your first word to find the answer. If you don‚Äôt know it right away, pick a second word that uses different letters you haven‚Äôt tried yet. This will help you narrow down your options quicker.
  • Tip 3: Don‚Äôt use duplicate letters too early. If you think a word has a duplicate letter, wait until you‚Äôre more confident the letter appears twice in the word.
  • Tip 4: Wait on uncommon letters. To make it easier, try and find all the common letters first. Once you‚Äôve ruled out any common vowels or consonants, then give letters like ‚ÄúJ‚Äù, ‚ÄúX‚Äù, or ‚ÄúZ‚Äù a try.

Hint for Today‚Äôs Wordle Answer‚ÄîGame #1536

Without giving the Wordle answer completely away just yet, here are a couple helpful hints for today to get you started:

  • Hint 1: Today‚Äôs Wordle answer starts with the letter ‚ÄúM‚Äù

Use these clues to narrow down your guesses and increase your chances of solving Wordle #1536 for September 2, 2025.

Today‚Äôs Wordle Answer For September 2, 2025‚ÄîGame #1536
